mapper.sql: CityID, CityName, ZipCode, ProvinceID, DateCreated, DateUpdated
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tbl_s_city ( CityID, CityName, ZipCode, ProvinceID, DateCreated, DateUpdated ) VALUES ( #{cityId}, #{cityName}, #{zipCode}, #{provinceId}, #{dateCreated}, #{dateUpdated} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE tbl_s_city
CityName = #{cityName},
ZipCode = #{zipCode},
ProvinceID = #{provinceId},
DateCreated = #{dateCreated},
DateUpdated = #{dateUpdated},
WHERE CityID = #{cityId}

UPDATE tbl_s_city
CityName = #{map.cityName},
ZipCode = #{map.zipCode},
ProvinceID = #{map.provinceId},
DateCreated = #{map.dateCreated},
DateUpdated = #{map.dateUpdated},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_s_city ( CityID, CityName, ZipCode, ProvinceID, DateCreated, DateUpdated ) VALUES ( #{map.cityId}, #{map.cityName}, #{map.zipCode}, #{map.provinceId}, #{map.dateCreated}, #{map.dateUpdated} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tbl_s_city
AND CityID like CONCAT('%', #{cityId} , '%')
AND CityName like CONCAT('%', #{cityName} , '%')
AND ZipCode like CONCAT('%', #{zipCode} , '%')
AND ProvinceID like CONCAT('%', #{provinceId} , '%')
AND DateCreated like CONCAT('%', #{dateCreated} , '%')
AND DateUpdated like CONCAT('%', #{dateUpdated} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
